Review.Contenu: The tech on our account makes changes sometimes without considering the consequences-Just had an issue we fixed where it had effects that caused payroll issues and other problems with our replicators where we had subsequent calls that needed setup because of the fallout of changes. He also sometimes has side personal conversations with his wife (working from home) while we're on the phone/zoom call.
Kevin knew the issue right away and it was a quick fix.

Review.Titre: Bangert always makes our job easier...
Review.Contenu: Bangert employees are always extremely knowledgeable about their areas of expertise. Depending on them to know all the ins and outs of Sage makes our job 100x easier.
Mike B responded to my ticket very quickly and resolved my issue right away. Great people to work with!

Review.Titre: Kevin was great to work with
Review.Contenu: Kevin was great to work with, like every year!
Bangert makes it easy.Needed to migrate from our old system to a new one and Christopher made the transition smooth and quick.

Review.Titre: From my first day at work
Review.Contenu: From my first day at work, Mike Baio has been there – above and beyond – through my journey in re-training me how to navigate through the software! He's always got right back to me and guided me through countess questions and helped me understand how the software works. I can always count on quick replies and easy fixes.

Our Sage upgrade experience went very smoothly!  Chris let us know what to expect in the process, the time considerations, who we should involve, and was there to walk us through the process.  The whole experience went as he described and we appreciated his guidance on what to watch for and what to review afterwards to confirm the upgrades completed successfully without issues.  Thank you Chris!

Very experienced professionals helping work through issues.  He tested the product several times to make sure there were no issues and made sure I was comfortable with the process.  Very thorough and efficient.

Review.Titre: The Helpdesk has been easy to use and…
Review.Contenu: The Helpdesk has been easy to use and service is always timely.  We appreciate the expertise we receive from the Helpdesk.
Bojan walked me right through what I needed to get done professionally, quickly and with great patience as I am still learning Sage 300.
Kevin is always extremely helpful.  Knows his stuff.  I have never had an issue that he couldn't help me with.
Top Notch customer service, everyone I have worked with are always willing to go the extra step to take care of whatever is needed.

Review.Titre: Our company used Bangert to implement Sage 100 Contractor, and Sage Paperless.
Review.Contenu: Our company used Bangert to implement Sage software about 8 years ago before I took over my current position in the company. One of the responsibilities I have now is to manage our software, and I am not an IT professional at all. We were recently having an issue with Sage Paperless working correctly. I had contacted Sage about this, and we figured out that our license had expired. This had happened before I had taken over. I fortunately remembered that Bangert had helped us implement Sage software and reached out to them. Hillary and Brett in the support department got involved and figured out what was needed, and who I needed to contact to get everything working correctly. They spent time and effort on this even though ultimately there was no fee involved in it for Bangert. They did this because it seems that they are dedicated to making sure customers (even ones from years ago) have a good experience with the software that they purchase through them. Without them we would still be having issues with our software, and no idea how to fix it. I could not recommend Bangert more highly for this, and will continue to recommend them to anyone who is looking to implement new software for their company.
Jim is extremely knowledgeable, able to assist with everyday work flows as well as designing reports required for our business.

Review.Titre: I had the pleasure to work with…
Review.Contenu: I had the pleasure to work with Christopher, he was very knowledgeable and very helpful.  He was able to update our report in a very timely manner.
Kevin made the experience great. He listened to the problem, laid out the steps to resolve the problem, and answered all questions.
Jim C. is always so helpful! There hasn't been any question he hasn't been able to answer and he's very quick to respond to a call or an email.

Review.Titre: Kevin did a great job fixing the report…
Review.Contenu: Kevin did a great job fixing the report and making sure that it would work for future exports.
